why.title: Why Work With Me?
why.p1: Most websites fail not because of design, but because they can’t scale, aren’t maintained, and become costly over time.
why.p2: I design systems with a simple question in mind: will this still work three years from now?
why.p3:
If you want the cheapest and fastest template, I’m probably not the right fit.
But if you want a technical partner who grows with your business, I am.
